content: so you could count row later make one more hat to other direction weave in ends attach a pompom to the top of the hat if desired to knit the cowl with waste yarn cast on 50 stitches using provisional cast-on method first row *k1 p1* till the end of the row ​ starting from row 2 work in brioche stitch for 120cm / 47 inches that s good enough for a double neck-wrap cowl you can make it shorter/longer depending on your desire remove the waste yarn put the live stitches on the needle sew both sides using the kitchener stitch weave in the ends if you have any questions about this pattern or find errors please do not hesitate to contact me via ravelry my username is siberiangirlknits *this pattern is for personal use only
